title: I CAN'T SEE MY MOUSE!!! ITS TINY AS FUCK
body: omfg i get reported cause i can't see my mouse and can't play like this?!!!?! get your shit straight riot, changing resolution doesnt help, i can't help it there's no 4k support, there's 4k since 2000 fucking 12, why doesnt this game support it!?!?!?!?!?!!?!?!?!?1?>$KJ[kl2erhcv po3i[

replies.body:
We're certainly looking into 4K support. In the meantime, I recommend running League and your Windows resolution at 1080p or running 4K @ Full Screen while **avoiding** *Alt+Tabbing* during the match, which often results in UI scaling issues.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
